Text: This moron will say his link is not a spam link just hit "get content". When you do it with a real online protection service - like Malwarebytes - it will not let you open unless you "trust" it. Just hit the scumbags link and see what happens!!!!

The preview work, in opposite to a lot of others. And you don't have to wait 30 sec to see it or choose it from a list with over 40 links to different previews. So quit whining;) I'm doing this because I've been kicked from blogs and host because of to much traffic from pirate-places and that's fucking annoying.
